page.title: 04Uyeasound Up Helly Aa Jarl.
page.content: The Guizer Jarl is the leader of the Jarl Squad and he is the most important person in the Up Helly Aa celebration.My Dad was chosen by the Up Helly Aa Committee as Guizer Jarl in 1980. The Guizer Jarl wears a winged helmet,a coat of mail,a cloak and a kirtle.He carries a shield and battle axe.The other members of the Jarl Squad also dress as Vikings. The Guizer Jarl's duties include organising torch making and bonfire building.He also visits the people who help with Up Helly Aa.These people include the Galley Pullers,Bill Composers,Kitchen Helpers and Musicians. During the procession the Guizer Jarl rides in the Galley and in the Hall he gives a vote of thanks.
